body.p: After several days of being read-only the Gentoo Forums are back online after the upgrade to MySQL 5 and a full conversion to UTF-8. The upgrade took a little longer than expected due to some unforseen problems along the way, but the wait was worth it as all data is now in UTF-8 with very few conversion errors.

If you notice any problems with topics or posts that have been converted incorrectly, or if you have any questions or comments, please post them to the Forums topic UTF-8 conversion feedback. If you have any problems with your username or with private messages please send an email to the Forums team.
If you used any non-ASCII characters in your password you may not be able to log in to the forums, if this is the case you can request a new password.
